decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressively playing creatures and using them to overwhelm the opponent. The strategy involves ramping up quickly with mana dorks like Birds of Paradise and Avacyn's Pilgrim, while also utilizing tools like Birthing Pod and Eldritch Evolution to fetch powerful creatures from the deck. Cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Ranger-Captain of Eos help disrupt the opponent's game plan, while finishers like Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines and Questing Beast can quickly close out the game. The deck also includes plenty of removal in cards like Swords to Plowshares and Skyclave Apparition to deal with threats and keep the pressure on. Overall, the deck aims to deploy threats quickly and efficiently to outpace the opponent and secure victory.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage provided by Tivit, Seller of Secrets. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building your own resources and eventually winning the game through a combination of strong control elements and powerful win conditions. With a mix of efficient removal spells, countermagic, and card draw, the deck seeks to outvalue opponents and outmaneuver them in the late game. By carefully managing resources and utilizing Tivit's abilities effectively, the deck can dominate the battlefield and dictate the pace of the game, ultimately leading to victory through superior control and strategic play.
